post.description: This API updates multiple calls at once.

get.description: This API fetches the details of a call.

parameters.name: include
parameters.description: Additional information related to the call. Values allowed are:  @contacts@, @assignee@,@tickets@,@teams@,@livecalls@,@creator@.

schema.description: Additional information related to the call. Values allowed are:  @contacts@, @assignee@,@tickets@,@teams@,@livecalls@,@creator@.

patch.description: This API updates the details of a call.

get.description: This API lists a particular number of calls associated with a contact, based on the limit specified.
This API lists a particular number of calls associated with an account, based on the limit specified.

post.description: This API moves call entries to the Recycle Bin of your help desk portal.

post.summary: Clear live call mapping from an activity
post.description: This API clears the live call mapping from an activity

get.description: This API fetches a particular number of calls, based on the limit specified.

post.description: This API adds a call entry to your help desk portal.
This API deletes the given spam calls
This API deletes all spam calls.

get.description: This API lists a particular number of calls associated with a ticket, based on the limit specified.

parameters.name: sortBy
parameters.description: Sort by a specific attribute: @startTime@ or @createdTime@.The default sorting order is ascending. A @-@ prefix denotes descending order of sorting.

schema.description: Sort by a specific attribute: @startTime@ or @createdTime@.The default sorting order is ascending. A @-@ prefix denotes descending order of sorting.

contactId.description: ID of the contact associated with the call

departmentId.description: ID of the department from which the activities must be fetched

startTime.description: Time when the call started. The value of this key must be recorded in theÂ ISO date format of yyyy-MM-ddThh:mm:ss.SSSZ.

ownerId.description: ID of the user to whom the call is assigned

ticketId.description: ID of the ticket associated with the call
